LanguageData.Megascarab.label: Megascarab
LanguageData.Megascarab.description: A large, genetically-engineered beetle. What was once the worker caste of an artifical ecosystem of insectoids designed to fight Mechanoid invasions, it is now usually seen without its deadlier insectoid cousins. Still, its size and hard shell craft it dangerous when it attacks. An eusocial creature, it cannot reproduce individually.
LanguageData.Spelopede.label: Spelopede
LanguageData.Spelopede.description: A medium-sized bioengineered bug the size of a sheep. The spelopede is the middle caste of a hive, taking care of most work tasks as well as fighting with its 발톱.
LanguageData.Megaspider.label: megaspider
LanguageData.Megaspider.description: Not actually a spider, the megaspider is a genetically-engineered giant insectoid the size of a bear. Designed for heavy work and combat, its thick 키틴ous armor makes it hard to kill, while its long deadly ripper-blades craft it deadly.
LanguageData.Scorpion.label: 전갈
LanguageData.Scorpion.description: 전갈s are predatory arachnids with eight legs. The two frontal legs consist of a pair of sharp, grasping 발톱. They have a segmented 꼬리 that ends with a venomous stinger.
